title: watsonx Code Assistant documentation
introduction: Welcome to the IBM watsonx Code Assistant documentation

section_recommended.title: Getting started with watsonx Code Assistant
section_recommended.description: watsonx Code Assistant provides pre-trained models based on specific programming languages to help you to generate reliable and accurate code.

section_recommended.title: Writing Ansible playbooks with AI-generated recommendations with watsonx Code Assistant for Red Hat Ansible Lightspeed
section_recommended.description: Learn about watsonx Code Assistant for Red Hat Ansible Lightspeed

section_recommended.title: Refactoring and transforming COBOL code with IBM watsonx Code Assistant for Z
section_recommended.description: Learn about watsonx Code Assistant for Z.

tiles.title: watsonx Code Assistant general availability
tiles.description: watsonx Code Assistant for Red Hat Ansible Lightspeed and watsonx Code Assistant for Z are now available.
